value:
Swordsmanship may be my main
interest, but I know my way around
a battlefield.

Only a fool would sit back and rely on
social status or a Crest. Train hard.
Skill is everything.

Ugh—Sylvain's causing trouble again.
But if I make a scene stopping him,
Ingrid's going to lecture us both...

I want to learn from the Heroes who
have been tested by the toughest
battles. Their skills are the real thing.

Even in this world, people expect me
to play nice with the boar? Hmph.
I'll handle things my own way.

I'm Felix. I'm here to see how your
best fighters compare to the ones in
$Nf's castle.

Too easy. Attack me all at once
next time.
Weak opponents don't interest me.
Hmph. I've been too cautious...

Looks like I've gotten the hang of it.
But I won't get complacent.

I am Felix Hugo Fraldarius. Swordplay
is my only interest. Don't waste my
time with anything else.

I'll be honest—I was pretty annoyed
when you yanked me into this world
without my consent.$k$pOnce I got used to it, though, I began
to see the appeal of the place. I might
even prefer to stay.$k$pMy professors from Garreg Mach are
all here—along with so many other
strong fighters to watch and study.$k$pYou might have been able to talk me
into helping Askr for its own sake, but
with all these learning opportunities...$k$pWell, let's just say I don't need any
convincing. This is as good a chance
as any to sharpen my skills.$k$pSo, consider me in for the long haul.
I want to see how far I can go without
relying on my status as a noble.
Too slow!
Is that all?
Worthless!
An opening!
Can't lift my weapon.
Call me Felix. My family name? What does that matter?
Stop that. If you want to fight me, say so.
Skilled sparring partners wherever I look. This will be fun.
Dimitri? Ugh, what has the boar done this time?
Give me the name of your best blacksmith. I can't entrust my weapon to some flailing incompetent.
Wherever I go, I am met by the specter of war.
Enough talk, Summoner. Let your sword speak for you... What? You don't wield one?
Fine.
Hmph.
I'll do it.
